original_text: I appeal to you, brothers, bear with my word of exhortation, for I have written to you briefly.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 너희를 권하노니 권면의 말을 용납하라 내가 간단히 너희에게 썼느니라

sentences.original_text: bear with my word of exhortation,
for I have written to you briefly.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 내가 너희에게 간략하게 편지하였기 때문이라.
